meanings.definition: To surpass others in some attribute or quality.
meanings.sent1: She is excelling in her studies, always getting the highest grades.
meanings.sent2: The athlete is excelling in the competition, leaving others behind.
meanings.sent3: Even the tortoise was surprised to see the snail excelling in the race.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a rocket, excelling past all obstacles in her way.
meanings.sent5: The sunflower stood tall, excelling in its beauty among the other flowers.

meanings.definition: To be exceptionally good at something.
meanings.sent1: He is excelling in playing the piano, performing flawlessly every time.
meanings.sent2: The chef is excelling in creating delicious dishes that everyone loves.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it was excelling at hide-and-seek, but it was just napping.
meanings.sent4: Her voice soared, excelling like a bird in the clear blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The painting stood out, excelling in its use of vibrant colors and intricate details.
